title: Item Spawner
description: Spawn any items/objects with a sexy UI
readme:
How to use it?

To open the menu press F8 To give yourself an item, click on a item and click GIVE. You can press the + and - button to change the amount to give, you can also edit the amount as its a textfield.

How does it works?
author: TeKGameR950
